data.title: Johnny Coppin, Cara Dillon, Steve Tilston & Jez Lowe
data.meta_description: Tracks from Cara Dillon, Steve Tilston & Jez Lowe, We Banjo 3 and many more.
data.text:
GIG GUIDE SAT 19th NOVEMBER 2016

Sat 19

Jim Moray at Everyman Theatre Studio, Cheltenham 7.30pm 01242 572573

Winter Mountain - (Cornwall's Joe Francis) - Sundial Theatre, Cirencester 7.30pm

Paul Downes at St. Mary's Church, Forthampton nr Tewkesbury at 7.30pm Tickets 07811 643115

The Reservoir Mandolin Band - at Leckhampton Village Hall, Free admission 7pm

Cam Penner and Jon Wood - (USA americana) - The Convent, South Woodchester, doors 8pm -live on netgig at 9pm

May Thrill in concert at Market Theatre, Ledbury with The Vogwells 7.30pm www.themarkettheatre.com

French dancing with The Eelgrinders at Horsley Village Hall, nr. Nailsworth 8pm BYO Drinks Hall open from 5pm Info: 07800 727570

Merry Hell + support from Folklaw - Bristol Folk House - Park Street 7.30pm tickets from ashkeysmusic.com

Hank Wangford + Brad Breath (aka Andy Roberts) + Anna "The Spanner" Robinson in the No Hall Too Small show - the darker recesses of country music - Colwall V Hall nr Malvern tickets 01684 540366

Vin Garbutt- Tiddy Hall, Ascott -u- Wychwood, Oxon, Tickets – 01993 831427

Sun 20

Paul Downes - Dursley Acoustic Music Nights, 13 Five Acres, Dursley, 7.30pm 01453 545065

Richard Grainger is guest at Forest Folk Club- The Royal Oak, Whitecroft nr Lydney 7.30pm

Dave Pegg (Fairport Convention) & Anthony John Clarke - The Convent, South Woodchester, doors 8pm -live on netgig at 9pm

Workshop for Stroud Wassail at Museum on the Park 11 – 1pm recruiting wassailers to sing, perform and collect food and money on behalf of the Stroud Food Bank in the week leading up to the 14th January. Info - Robin 07843 241371 or robin@robinburton.co.uk

Show of Hands - Bristol Colston Hall

Ninebarrow - Chapel Arts in Bath

Scott Cook( Can) & Jez Hellard - The Bell Inn, Bath

Mon 21

Cheltenham Ukelele Club - The Exmouth on Bath Road

Tue 22

Folk at Frampton on Severn Village Hall 7.30pm

Wed 23

Scott Cook( Can) & Jez Hellard - The Prince Albert, Stroud

Glos singer Gwilym Davies - is the guest at the Carpenter's Arms Miserden Info: Kevin 01285 821283

Thu 24

Alaw (Welsh folk trio of Dylan Fowler, Jamie Smith, and Oli Wilson-Dickson ) are guests at Evergreen Hall, Broadwell nr Coleford

Tickets / Info: 01594 833334

Irish Acoustic night at The Crown & Sceptre in Stroud

Minchinhampton Folk Club at The Old Crown Paganhill in Stroud

Fri 25

Methera - Ruskin Mill, Nailsworth 8pm 01453 837537

Sarah McQuaid -- in the bar of the Roses Theatre, Tewkesbury 8:30pm 01684 295074 www.rosestheatre.org

Christmas concert with Festivus and Iron and Oak - Market House, Minchinhampton 7.30pm tickets 01453 750494 barry@bwatkins.co.uk

Red Dirt Skinners - blues & americana duo The Convent, South Woodchester, doors 8pm -live on netgig at 9pm

Riverfolk at The Trout Inn, Riverside, Lechlade - 8pm

Gadarene - 5 piece turning English 18th and 19th cent tunes into modern dance hits - set inc clog and step dancing - Bristol Folk House - Park Street 7.30pm tickets from ashkeysmusic.com

Eliza Carthy & The Wayward Band - Colston Hall in Bristol 7.30pm

The Open Secrets - americana band at The Salt Cafe on St George's Rd in Bristol

Roving Crows- Chapel Arts in Bath

Somers TFC--- is ev Friday at the Alma Tavern in Worcester

Swindon FSC- meets at the Milton Rd Social Club every week

Sat 26

Flamenco guitar workshop with David Espinosa 3-4pm

Flamenco dance workshop 4-5.30pm -

then evening performance by Adrian Brenes and company at 8pm - at Subscription Rooms in Stroud - 01453 760900

Mazaika - duo playing with Russian soul and Gypsy passion - Westcote Village Hall !Tickets (including welcome drink) from Christine 01993 831196

Winchcombe-based folk choir "Shepherds Crook" will be presenting "Glad Tidings", a concert of Christmas music based on the work of local writer Fred Archer. St Mary's Church, Elmley Castle. 7pm. Tickets - to include mince pies and Christmas Punch - info 01386 710394,

Martin Harley acoustic roots and blues guitarist- The Convent, South Woodchester, doors 8pm -live on netgig at 9pm

The Open Secrets - americana band - The Swan at Bradford on Avon
